channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Wharekura
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Wharekura.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Homesteads
channel.desc: This episode looks at the homestead of Dame Whina Cooper in Panguru through the eyes of her daughter, Hinerangi Cooper Puru, who was raised in this home. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Sachies Kitchen
channel.desc: Chef Sachie Nomura is in Marlborough visiting Middlehurst Sheep Station, Te P? Family Vineyards, La Ruca Food Truck and Katabatic Boat Charters. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Nurturing Hope
channel.desc: NEW: A heart-warming factual reality tv series that follows Kaikohe mother, first language speaker Clara Aperahama Kopa and the journey to improve the life of her severely disabled son, Mungzy.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Treaty Road
channel.desc: NEW: In Treaty 3 territory, Erin and Saxon learn about the ongoing struggle to protect the water from contamination.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: H?kina Te M?nuka
channel.desc: NEW: The M?nihera wh?nau found their healing in the teachings of their ancestors. Through their journey they have created many kaupapa and tikanga to help wh?nau navigate the modern world.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mothering Sunday
channel.desc: A maid living in post-World War I England secretly plans to meet with the man she loves before he leaves to marry another woman. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Cocomelon
channel.desc: Join the CoComelon family in a world that centres on the everyday experiences of young children through toe-tapping music. (R).

channel.title: T?hura

channel.title: Takaro Tribe
channel.desc: T??karo Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa R??kau, Pond K?k??, P? and Waea Wao live.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: Kura is furious that they have lost the godstick again and tries her best to stop her sister and Josh from making a deal with Hikuroa. (R).

channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.desc: A fun sing-along M?ori performing arts series for children. (R).

channel.desc: Children from kura across the country showcase their haka skills. (R).

channel.title: Mataora Digital
channel.desc: Amazing content curated for rangatahi, wh?nau and pakeke. Made by the Mataora team. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube Haka
channel.desc: Welcome to the fifth season of Te N?tube. A brand-new show with a twist- a kapa haka called Te N?tube Haka. Join Atareta, Te Haakura and their wh?nau as they set the plan for Te N?tube Haka. (R).

channel.desc: Our favourite flavours of the Pacific are presented in a Fresh Poly-platter in this series dedicated to inspiring Islanders worldwide.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? K?tiro O Taranaki
channel.desc: The village is excited as they prepare for a Grand Feast with ex-soldiers turned farmers. We meet the Kuia-Gang as they weave and gossip about the events of the day. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? K?tiro O Taranaki
channel.desc: Mihi (8) doesn't understand why they are hosting the farmers so Kuia explains the situation to her. Wai is suspicious of the Pa?keha?. Kuia drops some wisdom on how to deal with their big emotions. (R).

channel.desc: Uncover Te Tai o Poutini's essence: history, p?r?kau, community, and the sacred Pounamu. (R).

channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Homesteads
channel.desc: Three generations of the Black family live a rural lifestyle together on their kainga 'Te Hurepo', in eastern Bay of Plenty. (R).

channel.title: Nomad
channel.desc: NEW: Kahu embarks on a journey to Otago and ?tapiri, where he connects with Tumai Cassidy, and visits Miguel Fernandez, a visionary reviving ancient practices and building sustainable futures.

channel.title: Motuhaketanga
channel.desc: PREMIERE: MOTUHAKETANGA follows three w??hine M?ori preparing to leave prison, and the challenges they face once they walk out the prison gates, on a path to creating their own motuhaketanga.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Loko
channel.desc: The rise, fall and redemption of Hip Hop artist 'KD Lok' in a story of music, mental health and Maoritanga. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tapuwae Leave Only Footprints
channel.desc: Pio Terei is on a journey to discover M?ori and Hawaiian indigenous connections through tourism. In this episode we visit some of the national parks in Hawai'i. (R).

channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Iconic archival series documenting the unique stories and histories of M?ori. (R).

channel.title: Beyond Matariki
channel.desc: Join Professor Rangi Matamua as he talks to the K?anga season. We talk about the signs of each lunar month that make up this season. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Chatham Islanders
channel.desc: There's more to these islands than what you see. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: NEW: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Moon Tide Fishing
channel.desc: Presenter Nore Martin shows when and where to fish according to the M?ori lunar calendar. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Native Ride
channel.desc: A handful of unforgettable M?ori characters stride out on a 100-day quest to tame a totally wild Ruatahuna horse for a grand competition in this stunning and poignant series. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tales From Zambia
channel.desc: NEW: Explore Zambia's diverse wildlife, from majestic elephants to playful baboons, through this captivating collection. Venture into breathtaking habitats and witness fascinating animal behaviours.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Michif Country
channel.desc: NEW: A glimpse into the St. Laurent M?tis nation on Lake Manitoba, taking viewers on a journey with the most active and talented hunters, trappers, and fishermen in the community.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunting Aotearoa
channel.desc: Join skilled hunter-gatherer, Peter Peeti, for another exciting hunting season. Pete is with Wiremu Grace searching for wild pigs and deer at Otapawa Station, Manawatu. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Only In Aotearoa
channel.desc: Short and sharp comedy skits from a M?ori perspective. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: East Coast Rising
channel.desc: The community comes together for the tangi of East Coast legend Ben Kaiwai. They also rally together for the next generation to provide lunches to the local kura. (R).
